title: ICE / ACELE AND ASSOCIATES
description: this is where the "ask about acele's associates" and "what's your name" branches are located.

links.title: You: ""And your surname?""
links.text: "And your surname?"

links.title: Acele: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: You: ""I'm from the police. It's for the..."
links.text: "I'm from the police. It's for the paperwork."

links.title: You: ""Why indeed? Forget it.""
links.text: "Why indeed? Forget it."

links.title: You: ""Acele who? I'm not a young suitor,..."
links.text: "Acele who? I'm not a young suitor, this is official police business."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay..." She hesitates. "It's Berg..."
links.text: "Okay..." She hesitates. "It's Berger."

links.title: Logic: "A very common name."
links.text: A very common name.

links.title: Authority: "You have little reason to doubt tha..."
links.text: You have little reason to doubt that's her real name, but... she's not all that surprised by this cop-show questioning, is she?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Her hair is dyed blonde, with dark..."
links.text: Her hair is dyed blonde, with dark roots showing. There's a coarseness to her features, some masculinity below that timidness.

links.title: You: ""Tell me about Soona.""
links.text: "Tell me about Soona."

links.title: Acele: ""Uh... she's a bit odd, I have to s..."
links.text: "Uh... she's a bit odd, I have to say. Doesn't talk much. I'm not really sure how to vibe with her, y'know? Seems like she's not in a very good mood most of the time."

links.title: Acele: ""But earlier today she told me abou..."
links.text: "But earlier today she told me about... welkins?" Acele grimaces, as if it's the first time hearing the word. "And she seemed oddly happy. Like she had had some idea with those... little creatures. Some artistic idea. I didn't really listen, I was busy with my mic."

links.title: You: ""What do you think of the crab-man?""
links.text: "What do you think of the crab-man?"

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, the crab-man." She shudders. "..."
links.text: "Oh, the crab-man." She shudders. "Still gives me the creeps, the way he moves... But he doesn't actually come down that much, just climbs around the rafters."

links.title: Acele: ""I just try to stay away from the c..."
links.text: "I just try to stay away from the crab-man, but he talks to Noid. They seem to have some 'thing' going on."

links.title: You: ""Oh, he talks to Noid? What for?""
links.text: "Oh, he talks to Noid? What for?"

links.title: Acele: ""Beats me... Noid said they get alo..."
links.text: "Beats me... Noid said they get along, somehow. They're both crazy enough, I guess."

links.title: You: ""What does he do up there?""
links.text: "What does he do up there?"

links.title: Acele: ""Who knows?" She shrugs. "He doesn'..."
links.text: "Who knows?" She shrugs. "He doesn't really answer our questions, see. Not that it's easy to ask them. What are we supposed to do, yell up at the tower?"

links.title: You: ""Thanks. About the others...""
links.text: "Thanks. About the others..."

links.title: You: ""Tell me about Andre.""
links.text: "Tell me about Andre."

links.title: Acele: ""Andre? He's a cool guy. Doesn't re..."
links.text: "Andre? He's a cool guy. Doesn't really come off as one, but he is. To me at least..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "She rubs her sides, but not from co..."
links.text: She rubs her sides, but not from cold. Her shoulders are relaxed. She must have taken a hit or she's on an upswing.

links.title: Acele: ""He takes care of shit. Sorry, I me..."
links.text: "He takes care of shit. Sorry, I mean he's got a *vision*. Of what life should be, you know? He tries to push things until everything falls into place. He's an organizer."

links.title: You: ""What has he organized?""
links.text: "What has he organized?"

links.title: Acele: ""Nothing. But then again... there's..."
links.text: "Nothing. But then again... there's nothing to organize around here either. He really wants this church thing to work..."

links.title: Acele: ""Must have taken it as a sign when..."
links.text: "Must have taken it as a sign when he found it abandoned like that. Said it was an *augury*. I don't know where he got that from." She smiles. "Andre's not super intelligent..."

links.title: Acele: ""I've never seen him so psyched abo..."
links.text: "I've never seen him so psyched about anything though -- and he's often psyched. Looked sort of desperate, like it's his last chance or something. Or maybe he was just high..."

links.title: Acele: ""I mean, not that he does drugs. Ju..."
links.text: "I mean, not that he does drugs. Just *high* you know."

links.title: You: ""On life?""
links.text: "On life?"

links.title: Acele: ""Uh, yes. Anyway.""
links.text: "Uh, yes. Anyway."

links.title: You: ""Could it be that he's balding? Him..."
links.text: "Could it be that he's balding? Him thinking it's his last chance?"

links.title: Acele: ""Come to think of it, yes!" She lau..."
links.text: "Come to think of it, yes!" She laughs.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This is the first time you've heard..."
links.text: This is the first time you've heard her laugh.

links.title: Acele: ""He's in some kind of a self-destru..."
links.text: "He's in some kind of a self-destruction mode with that hair of his. Bleaching it like that. Probably wants to get rid of it altogether."

links.title: You: ""Is Andre your boyfriend?""
links.text: "Is Andre your boyfriend?"

links.title: Acele: ""Yes." She nods."
links.text: "Yes." She nods.

links.title: Empathy: "A quick response. She's very sure o..."
links.text: A quick response. She's very sure of it. He's someone she feels she can trust and even control, if need be.

links.title: You: ""Tell me about the others.""
links.text: "Tell me about the others."

links.title: You: ""On his mother's love?""
links.text: "On his mother's love?"

links.title: You: ""Relax, girl. I am a police officer..."
links.text: "Relax, girl. I am a police officer, but I'm perfectly corrupt. You can tell me about drugs and shit, I don't care."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah. Drugs. Shit. Fuck. We don't..."
links.text: "Yeah. Drugs. Shit. Fuck. We don't care." He smirks.

links.title: You: ""Tell me about the others.""
links.text: "Tell me about the others."

links.title: You: ""Tell me about Noid.""
links.text: "Tell me about Noid."

links.title: Acele: ""He's a Faubourger I guess, like th..."
links.text: "He's a Faubourger I guess, like the rest of us. Okay, maybe not Egg, I don't know about him, but Noid and the rest are from Faubourg, making the pilgrimage up north to visit The Paliseum."

links.title: Acele: ""He's real hard core about the life..."
links.text: "He's real hard core about the lifestyle."

links.title: You: ""What does he do?""
links.text: "What does he do?"

links.title: Acele: ""What do you mean, 'do'? Like for a..."
links.text: "What do you mean, 'do'? Like for a living?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Acele: ""He's a carpenter. Trained and all...."
links.text: "He's a carpenter. Trained and all. He's very good, he just doesn't have the mindset to work like that -- in a shop somewhere."

links.title: You: ""Is that because of his beliefs? Th..."
links.text: "Is that because of his beliefs? The hard core and the ribs, the... spinal cord and stuff?"

links.title: Acele: ""Wow. You really *have* talked to h..."
links.text: "Wow. You really *have* talked to him." She smiles. "Indeed. Noid serves no master but the beat."

links.title: Acele: ""Not to sound too dramatic, but I w..."
links.text: "Not to sound too dramatic, but I wouldn't make light of his belief system when he's around. Noid's a serious person. He's serious about the lifestyle."

links.title: You: ""What kind of mindset is that?""
links.text: "What kind of mindset is that?"

links.title: Acele: ""He abides by the hard core, sir. Y..."
links.text: "He abides by the hard core, sir. You would have to ask him yourself."

links.title: You: ""And you?""
links.text: "And you?"

links.title: Acele: ""Sir," she gives you a switchblade..."
links.text: "Sir," she gives you a switchblade smile. "I abide by *the law*."

links.title: Inland Empire: "A strange feeling... like before, w..."
links.text: A strange feeling... like before, when you caught her lying better than she should have. Every now and then something feels off about the way she speaks. She doesn't exactly change tone, but you feel as though there's more about her than she lets on.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A strange feeling... Every now and..."
links.text: A strange feeling... Every now and then, something feels off about the way she speaks. She doesn't change tone, but you feel as though there's more about her than she lets on.

links.title: You: ""Tell me more about him.""
links.text: "Tell me more about him."

links.title: Acele: ""What do you want to know?""
links.text: "What do you want to know?"

links.title: You: ""No, I meant for breakfast. Of cour..."
links.text: "No, I meant for breakfast. Of course for a living."

links.title: You: ""What is this pilgrimage you're tal..."
links.text: "What is this pilgrimage you're talking about?"

links.title: Acele: ""It's just something poor Faubourg..."
links.text: "It's just something poor Faubourg kids do every spring, to pass the time. We walk the entire length of Boogie Street, up to Jamrock. Or as much as possible."

links.title: You: ""Why wouldn't it be?""
links.text: "Why wouldn't it be?"

links.title: Acele: ""I don't know man, have you *been*..."
links.text: "I don't know man, have you *been* down Boogie Street? It's a little bewildering."

links.title: You: ""Let's say I *haven't* been down Bo..."
links.text: "Let's say I *haven't* been down Boogie Street."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, then you should go and take..."
links.text: "Okay, then you should go and take a look, I guess. Boogie Street is cool. It's got a lot of immigrants and all kinds of different people."

links.title: You: ""Oh, and I'm also a raging fascist..."
links.text: "Oh, and I'm also a raging fascist who doesn't approve of *different people* -- so no, I don't think I'll be going."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unfortunately, I can confirm that.""
links.text: "Unfortunately, I can confirm that."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay." She shrugs. "To each his ow..."
links.text: "Okay." She shrugs. "To each his own."

links.title: You: ""I might just do that if I make it..."
links.text: "I might just do that if I make it there alive."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah," she says, then opens her mo..."
links.text: "Yeah," she says, then opens her mouth like she's about to add something, but doesn't.

links.title: You: ""It's unlikely I'll make it there...."
links.text: "It's unlikely I'll make it there. Chest pains. Need to continue drinking. But thank you."

links.title: Acele: ""They do say death is an avenue. Li..."
links.text: "They do say death is an avenue. Like all the others." She's silent for a second like she's going to add something. But she doesn't.

links.title: You: ""Oh, I'm sorry... have I not told y..."
links.text: "Oh, I'm sorry... have I not told you I'm a raging alcoholic who recently drank himself into an oblivion so deep he can't even remember what sounds like the biggest street in the city?"

links.title: Acele: ""Uh... no?""
links.text: "Uh... no?"

links.title: You: ""Well, I am.""
links.text: "Well, I am."

links.title: You: ""Because I'm not. Now tell me somet..."
links.text: "Because I'm not. Now tell me something else about Noid."

links.title: Acele: ""Sure..." she says, slightly disori..."
links.text: "Sure..." she says, slightly disoriented. "What do you want to know?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, tell me about the others.""
links.text: "Actually, tell me about the others."

links.title: You: ""What's the deal with Egg Head?""
links.text: "What's the deal with Egg Head?"

links.title: Acele: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: You: ""What does he think he's doing when..."
links.text: "What does he think he's doing when he yells all that stuff?"

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, that... he's the party boy.""
links.text: "Oh, that... he's the party boy."

links.title: You: ""What's a party boy?""
links.text: "What's a party boy?"

links.title: Acele: ""Anodic music doesn't really do voc..."
links.text: "Anodic music doesn't really do vocals in the traditional sense. Vocals are thought of as *rock*. That's to say they're a bit *backward*. No offence if you like rock music, though. Rock music is cool by me."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Ptew ptew! Sweeesh! Your credential..."
links.text: Ptew ptew! Sweeesh! Your credentials as the resident Futureman of Revachol are being questioned. Show her you're hip with the times, gramps!

links.title: You: ""God damn right, rock music is the..."
links.text: "God damn right, rock music is the coolest. Rock music forever!"

links.title: Acele: ""Yes." She nods studiously. "Foreve..."
links.text: "Yes." She nods studiously. "Forever..."

links.title: You: ""No offence taken, go on.""
links.text: "No offence taken, go on."

links.title: Acele: ""Anyway, even if you don't have voc..."
links.text: "Anyway, even if you don't have vocals you still need someone to say something every now and then, right? To urge things on. That's where the party boy comes in..."

links.title: Acele: ""He basically just stands on the st..."
links.text: "He basically just stands on the stage and dances and yells how awesome everything is. It's very catchy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I understand. People are usually a..."
links.text: "I understand. People are usually afraid to do things if others aren't already doing them. Dancing makes you dance like sneezing makes you sneeze. Or yawning makes you..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anyway..." He looks around, a litt..."
links.text: "Anyway..." He looks around, a little embarrassed of the enthusiasm of his interjection.

links.title: You: ""We certainly saw that in practice,..."
links.text: "We certainly saw that in practice, didn't we?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, I suppose we did.""
links.text: "Yes, I suppose we did."

links.title: You: ""Tore that shit up.""
links.text: "Tore that shit up."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tore it to pieces.""
links.text: "Tore it to pieces."

links.title: You: ""Tell me more about Egg.""
links.text: "Tell me more about Egg."

links.title: Acele: ""What do you want to know?" She smi..."
links.text: "What do you want to know?" She smiles a little.

links.title: You: ""You don't have to tell *me* rock m..."
links.text: "You don't have to tell *me* rock music is dead. I abandoned rock music a long time ago. Can't disco to rock!"

links.title: Acele: ""Uh, okay..." She nods."
links.text: "Uh, okay..." She nods.

links.title: You: ""Where's he from? How long has he b..."
links.text: "Where's he from? How long has he been with you guys?"

links.title: Acele: ""Actually, we don't know where he's..."
links.text: "Actually, we don't know where he's from. Or who he is, really."

links.title: Acele: ""One time we were out partying, som..."
links.text: "One time we were out partying, somewhere in backwater Faubourg. Or maybe even Coal City, I can't remember. Maybe it was Coal City..."

links.title: Acele: ""Egg was yelling along to some jams..."
links.text: "Egg was yelling along to some jams someone was spinning, all night long. Just kept yelling until he didn't have a shred of voice left. When the sun came up over the mines... there were mines? Yeah, it was in Coal City!" She nods.

links.title: Acele: ""Egg came with us. He made this whe..."
links.text: "Egg came with us. He made this wheezing puppy dog sound all the way back. Couldn't even speak."

links.title: Acele: ""It was definitely Coal City, becau..."
links.text: "It was definitely Coal City, because it took us two days to walk back to the Fau. He just wheezed the whole way, we never really asked him why he came with us. Or who he was. I think his name is Germaine..."

links.title: Acele: ""People are sweet," she says quietl..."
links.text: "People are sweet," she says quietly.

links.title: Empathy: "You can see it must have been a gre..."
links.text: You can see it must have been a great night. The memory causes her to go silent for a moment or two.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You wish you'd been there."
links.text: You wish you'd been there.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The worst of the *banlieues*. A wre..."
links.text: The worst of the *banlieues*. A wretched heap of closed-down mines even west of Jamrock, on the dusty slope of Mont Martin. The remotest possible area of Revachol, no one even wants to exploit those people anymore.

links.title: You: ""Tell me about the others.""
links.text: "Tell me about the others."

links.title: Acele: ""Who do you want to know about?""
links.text: "Who do you want to know about?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, do tell me about *yourse..."
links.text: "Actually, do tell me about *yourself*."

links.title: Acele: ""Me?""
links.text: "Me?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, I forgot. Tell me about yours..."
links.text: "Yes, I forgot. Tell me about yourself."

links.title: Acele: ""I'm a silver bird.""
links.text: "I'm a silver bird."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There's that phrase again. It reall..."
links.text: There's that phrase again. It really reminds you of... *something*.

links.title: You: ""What does that mean?""
links.text: "What does that mean?"

links.title: Acele: ""It means I don't answer questions..."
links.text: "It means I don't answer questions about myself."

links.title: You: ""But I'm a police officer. You *hav..."
links.text: "But I'm a police officer. You *have* to answer me."

links.title: Acele: ""Is there a law that would stop me..."
links.text: "Is there a law that would stop me from lying, though?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That would depend on the circumsta..."
links.text: "That would depend on the circumstances." The lieutenant taps his foot.

links.title: You: ""There's more to you than you let o..."
links.text: "There's more to you than you let on. What am I not seeing?"

links.title: Acele: ""Alright." She picks up the tape re..."
links.text: "Alright." She picks up the tape recorder and looks you in the eye...

links.title: Acele: ""There is.""
links.text: "There is."

links.title: You: ""Fair enough.""
links.text: "Fair enough."

links.title: Acele: ""Thank you.""
links.text: "Thank you."

links.title: You: ""Okay, lets leave it at that then.""
links.text: "Okay, lets leave it at that then."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hang on, that phrase. You're sudden..."
links.text: Hang on, that phrase. You're suddenly reminded of... *something*.

links.title: You: ""Actually, no.""
links.text: "Actually, no."

links.title: Acele: ""Yes, better that way...""
links.text: "Yes, better that way..."

links.title: You: ""Thank you. Some other questions.""
links.text: "Thank you. Some other questions."
